title: Define Synaesthesia Simulator Requirements
description: Outline the necessary features and functionalities for the Synaesthesia Simulator device.

title: Research Controlled Synaesthetic Techniques and Induction Methods for Synaesthesia Simulator
description: Conduct comprehensive research on various synaesthetic experiences and methods to induce them, focusing on controlled, repeatable, and applicable techniques for the development of the Synaesthesia Simulator. Explore both established and emerging techniques, emphasizing their potential implications for creativity enhancement and therapeutic uses.

title: Design User Interface for Synaesthesia Simulator
description: Create an intuitive and user-friendly interface that allows users to easily control and customize their synaesthetic experiences.

title: Develop Algorithms for Controlled Synaesthetic Induction
description: Create algorithms that can induce specific synaesthetic experiences based on user inputs and preferences.
dependencies: Research Synaesthesia Techniques and Induction Methods

title: Integrate Hardware Components for Synaesthesia Induction
description: Select, acquire, and integrate necessary hardware components to enable the controlled induction of synaesthetic experiences.

title: Test and Validate Synaesthesia Simulator Functionality
description: Perform rigorous testing to ensure the device functions correctly and safely, addressing any issues that arise.
dependencies: Design User Interface for Synaesthesia Simulator
Develop Algorithms for Controlled Synaesthetic Induction
Integrate Hardware Components for Synaesthesia Induction

title: Prepare User Manual and Documentation
description: Write clear instructions on how to use the device safely and effectively, as well as troubleshooting guides.
dependencies: Design User Interface for Synaesthesia Simulator
